page.title: 08LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: {WAGON WHEELS HOLIDAY CAMP 4 PEOPLE WORK THERE FULL-TIME AND 5 PEOPLE WORK THERE PART-TIME AND 25 CASUAL. THEIR JOBS ARE, OWNER, MANAGER, BOOKING SECRETARY, BAR MANAGER, BAR STAFF, GROUNDSMEN, SHOP KEEPER, BOOK KEEPER.IN THE CLUB ABOUT 3 OR 4 PEOPLE WORK THERE AND THEY ARE ALL PART-TIME.3 WORK BEHIND THE BAR AND ONE PLAYS THE ORGAN OR RUNS A DISCO.ONE CLEANER WHO WORKS FULL-TIME. AT THE STABLES THEY HAVE 11 HORSES 3 PEOPLE WORK AT THE STABLES ALL FULL-TIME. THE JOBS THEY DO ARE ESCORT RIDES, HORSE GROOMING AND STABLE CLEANING {BAC SPANS} MAKES FARM BUILDINGS.12 PEOPLE WORK THERE ALL FULL-TIME 80% OF THE WOOD IS LOCAL.DOUGLAS FIR IS THE BEST SOFT WOOD IN THE COUNTRY AND DPEPE IS THE BEST HARD WOOD IN THE COUNTRY.
